articles.content: Fans think theyve discovered a reference to the unannounced PS5 Pro in a presentation leaked after the recent ransomware attack on Insomniac Games. Rumors of a PS5 Pro have been swirling for a while,… [+940 chars]

articles.title: Malware Using Google MultiLogin Exploit to Maintain Access Despite Password Reset - The Hacker News
articles.description: Information-stealing malware is exploiting an undocumented Google OAuth endpoint called MultiLogin to hijack user sessions.
articles.content: Information stealing malware are actively taking advantage of an undocumented Google OAuth endpoint named MultiLogin to hijack user sessions and allow continuous access to Google services even after … [+3846 chars]

articles.title: CISA warns of actively exploited bugs in Chrome and Excel parsing library - BleepingComputer
